testcase.name: [first uninstall] Register a new user using magic link
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Launcher Screen............................................passed And User selects Create Account.............................................passed Given User enters a valid e-mail address....................................passed And User selects a country from the list....................................passed And User enters birth date..................................................passed And User proceeds with Consents.............................................passed And User enters a display name..............................................passed When User clicks on E-mail Me Magic Link....................................passed And User clicks Check E-mail from Magic Link................................passed And User unlocks the app from received e-mail...............................passed And User skips tutorial.....................................................passed Then User is in Home View...................................................passed

testcase.name: [first uninstall] User is in Home Screen after a successful Register even when interacting with the app
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Launcher Screen............................................passed And User selects Create Account.............................................passed Given User enters a valid e-mail address....................................passed And User selects a country from the list....................................passed And User enters birth date..................................................passed And User proceeds with Consents.............................................passed And User enters a display name..............................................passed When User clicks on E-mail Me Magic Link....................................passed And User clicks Check E-mail from Magic Link................................passed And User unlocks the app from received e-mail...............................passed And User skips tutorial.....................................................passed And User is in Home View....................................................passed And User "puts the app in the background"...................................passed And User open the app.......................................................passed Then User is in "Home Screen"...............................................passed

testcase.name: [first uninstall] User is in Home Screen after a successful Register even when interacting with the app 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Launcher Screen............................................passed And User selects Create Account.............................................passed Given User enters a valid e-mail address....................................passed And User selects a country from the list....................................passed And User enters birth date..................................................passed And User proceeds with Consents.............................................passed And User enters a display name..............................................passed When User clicks on E-mail Me Magic Link....................................passed And User clicks Check E-mail from Magic Link................................passed And User unlocks the app from received e-mail...............................passed And User skips tutorial.....................................................passed And User is in Home View....................................................passed And User "closes the app"...................................................passed And User open the app.......................................................passed Then User is in "Home Screen"...............................................passed

testcase.name: [first uninstall] Register a too young user
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Launcher Screen............................................passed And User selects Create Account.............................................passed Given User enters a valid e-mail address....................................passed And User selects a country from the list....................................passed And User enters a birth date from a recent date.............................passed Then User is notified that he is too young to register......................passed

testcase.name: [first uninstall] Trying to register an already registered user and continue with Login flow
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Launcher Screen............................................passed And User selects Create Account.............................................passed Given User enters an already registered e-mail address......................passed Then User is in Check E-mail Screen.........................................passed And User is recognized as to be already registered..........................passed When User clicks Check E-mail from Magic Link...............................passed And User unlocks the app from received e-mail...............................passed And User skips tutorial.....................................................passed Then User is in Home View...................................................passed
